title: Sri Lanka’s War had Witnesses : Indian Journalist B. Murali Reddy
content: Indian Journalist B. Murali Reddy – by Shenali D Waduge – Firstly Sri Lanka’s war did have witnesses. The witnesses were however NOT – Gordon Weiss, Francis Harrison, Channel 4, the Darusman Panel, Charles Petrie and a whole list of others who have promoted themselves as witnesses when they are not because they were never…
